QueryResult.text: SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, RESOURCES.USER_ID, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_NAME, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_CODE FROM BPM_DEF_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES, SRM_RESOURCES RESOURCES WHERE RESOURCES.ID = ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_RESOURCE' UNION SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, RESOURCES.USER_ID, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_NAME, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_CODE FROM BPM_DEF_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES, PRJ_RESOURCES PRJRES, SRM_RESOURCES RESOURCES WHERE PRJRES.PRPRIMARYROLEID = ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID AND ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_ROLE' AND PRJRES.PRID = RESOURCES.ID AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 UNION SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, USER_GROUPS.USER_ID, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_NAME, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_CODE FROM BPM_DEF_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES, CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS USER_GROUPS, SRM_RESOURCES RESOURCES WHERE USER_GROUPS.GROUP_ID = ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID AND USER_GROUPS.USER_ID=RESOURCES.USER_ID AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_GROUP' UNION SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, -1 AS USER_ID, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_NAME, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_CODE FROM BPM_DEF_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES WHERE ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_PROFILE' OR ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_TEMPLATE_PROFILE' UNION SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, -1 AS USER_ID, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_NAME, ASSIGNEES.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_CODE FROM BPM_DEF_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES WHERE ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_CUSTOM_RES_LOV'
